summary: A letter from The School District of Palm Beach County responding to a subpoena or records request by releasing student records. It is addressed to an unspecified recipient and includes the signature of the Director/Chief Information Officer.

persons.name: Dawn Pumphrey
persons.context: Appears as the signatory and listed official for The School District of Palm Beach County, responsible for releasing student records in response to a subpoena or request.

persons.name: Deepak Agarwal
persons.context: Listed alongside Dawn Pumphrey as a Director/Chief Information Officer for The School District of Palm Beach County, associated with the release of student records.

events.title: Release of Student Records
events.description: The School District of Palm Beach County responds to a subpoena or records request by releasing student records.

locations: 3300 Forest Hill Boulevard, Suite 6.241, West Palm Beach, FL 33406
keyFacts: The document is a formal response to a subpoena or records request for student records.
It is issued by The School District of Palm Beach County in July 2021.
The letter is signed by Dawn Pumphrey and Deepak Agarwal in their capacities as Director/Chief Information Officer.
The document indicates legal or investigative interest in student records from the school district.
